Rulings.Base:
1. This effect targets the cards in your opponent's GY.
2. You remove cards and then send cards from the Deck to the GY. They do not happen at the same time.
3. You can activate Delg's effect if your opponent has only 1 card in the GY, but not if they have no cards in their GY.
4. You can activate Delg's effect even if your opponent has less than 2 cards in their Deck. If you remove more cards than they have remaining, you send as many cards as possible.

PSCT.Base: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target up to 2 cards in your opponent's Graveyard; banish that target(s), then send the same number of cards from the top of their Deck to the Graveyard. This card cannot attack during the turn it is Normal or Special Summoned.
